participant_1.background:
I'm passionate about spending time with my family, though it can be difficult at times.
My parents are great, but they don't understand my lifestyle.
I feel like I'm not living up to my full potential.
I treasure my collection of vintage clothing.
I work as a barista, and I love creating delicious coffee drinks for my customers.

participant_2.background:
I'm looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can be close to nature and focus on my writing.
I'd rather avoid conflict, but I'm ready to defend myself if I need to.
i work as a trauma surgeon.
My most prized possession is the journal I keep of my travels, which I have filled with sketches and notes from my adventures.
i own a chevy tahoe.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love writing and traveling. What about you?
I like working as a barista and spending time with my family.
That's awesome. Do you have any plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe go back to school or travel more.
That sounds exciting. I'm looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can be close to nature and focus on my writing.
That's a great idea. I have a collection of vintage clothing that I love.
That's awesome. I have a journal that I keep of my travels, which I have filled with sketches and notes from my adventures.
That sounds really cool. I'd love to see it someday.
I'd be happy to show you. What do you do for a living?
I work as a barista. I love creating delicious coffee drinks for my customers.
That sounds like a fun job. I'm a trauma surgeon.
Wow, that's a tough job. How do you like it?
It's challenging, but it's also very rewarding. I love helping people.
That's awesome. I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks. I'm glad I met you.
Me too. It was nice talking to you.
